thread.title: Girl hospitalized after she was hit by a vehicle on North Lombard Street
thread.title_full: Girl hospitalized after she was hit by a vehicle on North Lombard Street | OregonLive.com

author: Rick Bella | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Girl hospitalized after she was hit by a vehicle on North Lombard Street
text:
An 11-year-old girl was rushed to the hospital after she was hit by a vehicle on North Lombard Street Friday.
The girl's name and condition are not available, but police described her injuries as "traumatic."
Traffic on North Lombard Street is expected to be affected for several hours.
Sgt. Pete Simpson, Portland Police Bureau spokesman, said a girl was struck at 8:24 a.m. in the 3200 block of North Lombard Street . Simpson said the driver remained at the scene and is cooperating with investigators.
The Traffic Division's Major Crash Team is investigating the crash.
-- Rick Bella rbella@oregonian.com
503-294-5915; @southnewshound
